net.coderazzi.filters.gui
Interface ITableFilterHeaderObserver

public interface ITableFilterHeaderObserver

A ITableFilterHeaderObserver instance receives notifications when the associated ITableFilterEditor instances are created, destroyed, or update the held filter.

Since:
version 2.0
Author:
Luis M Pena - lu@coderazzi.net

Method Summary
 void tableFilterEditorCreated(TableFilterHeader header, ITableFilterEditor editor)
          Informs the observer than a new filter editor is created
 void tableFilterEditorExcluded(TableFilterHeader header, ITableFilterEditor editor)
          Informs the observer than an existing filter editor has been excluded from the filter header
 void tableFilterUpdated(TableFilterHeader header, ITableFilterEditor editor, Object newValue)
          Notification made by the ITableFilterEditor when the filter's content is updated
 

Method Detail

Informs the observer than a new filter editor is created

Parameters:

editor -

void tableFilterEditorExcluded(TableFilterHeader header,

Parameters:

editor -

tableFilterUpdated

void tableFilterUpdated(TableFilterHeader header,
                        ITableFilterEditor editor,
                        Object newValue)

Notification made by the ITableFilterEditor when the filter's content is updated

Parameters:
header - the associated table filfter header
editor - the observable instance
newValue - the new content of the editor. Its type depends on the filter editor, ITableFilterEditor.getFilter()
